name: Antelope Canyon (Upper)
description:
Introduction

This is the most photographed canyon in the world!

This is a commercial non-technical canyon in the Navajo Indian reservation. You do not need to hire a guide, just show up at the booth on the road and buy your ticket.

The Upper is better than Antelope Canyon (Lower). Make sure you are there for the 1 o'clock and 12 o'clock ray of light that penetrate the canyon.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Entry to this area may be restricted; check for information regarding permits before attempting this trip
